fr.n7.stl.block.ast

Interface BlockFactory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ExpressionFactory, InstructionFactory, TypeFactory
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockFactoryImpl

    public interface BlockFactory
extends ExpressionFactory, InstructionFactory, TypeFactory
    Combines the various factories for the Bloc language.
